amount of energy produced (see p. 44-45).

TotalEnergies’ global indirect emissions (Scope\xa03) 2 in abso-

energy demand, is in reality not relevant to reduce global

the consumers of these products: the use of these products 
depends on their decisions and needs.

  This indicator measures the average GHG emissions

 •  the quantity of energy sold. Electricity is placed on 
an equal footing with fossil fuels, taking into account 
average capacity factors and average efficiency ratios.
